channel.title: Programming on Quentin Ackermann
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Quentin Ackermann

item.title: Project 2 : Redemption (C#/Unity)
item.description: Created step-by-step a horror story Welcome screen Designed the levels of the game Took a dive in game designing, which is an amazing field It was really incredible to find out the complexity and the variety of work behind a game as simple as this one ! I have to admit that I won’t take lightly anymore the efforts made from the editors to provide the gamers with a wonderful experience !

item.title: Project 1 : Lunchz App (Angular)
item.description: Created a nice front-end with Angular and PrimeNG Front-end created with Angular and PrimeNG Designed a robust back-end using Java/Spring Boot Realized a real-life SQL base using Postgresql Decide where to take a lunch each day with this amazing app ! Using Angular, the purpose is to vote for the place you want to eat at. In many companies, people have a set of places where they fetch their lunch, however sometimes they have difficulties to decide where everyone want to go.
